item.description:
April 23, 8pm: Karma, Reincarnation, and More.

Dr. Allan Hughes is presenter for this final class.
To register for this third class click here
For more information about these classes and other Science of Spirituality programs, see our local website
item.why: This is some of the feedback from previous classes: I enjoyed the session and the insight you provided. . . It was so interesting to be at home and attending the class - LOVED IT! . . . It was a good evening . . . thank you!

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Live Web Event -- Third Meditation Class: Karma, Reincarnation and More
